AffixDesc_Legendary: Monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by 12% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 60%.
AffixDesc_Magic: Monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by 8% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 40%.
AffixDesc_Rare: Monster attacks from a distance reduce dodge chance by 10% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 50%.
